docs.lead_paragraph: THE Rev. Dr. Leighton Parks, successor of Bishop Greer as rector of the wealthy and fashionable St. Bartholomew's Church, has some radical ideas upon the subject of divorce. These ideas, or at least some of them, he expressed in a vigorous sermon that created a decided stir among the congregation that crowded St. Bartholomew's on a recent Sunday morning.

headline.main: Woman's Higher Education Leads to Divorce.
